response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and innovation. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. I am extending this opportunity to you to acquire it for $18,000. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 18000}
